analysis.key_quote: Please exclude federal statistical-agency positions—at every supervisory level—from reclassification under any new “Schedule Policy/Career” authority. Preserve existing merit-system protections that insulate these experts from partisan removal and guarantee continuity, transparency, and methodological consistency.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of maintaining merit-based protections for federal statistical-agency staff, highlighting concerns about politicization and the potential negative impact on families relying on accurate data.
